definition: Spider-Man, see 蜘蛛俠|蜘蛛侠/nickname of French skyscraper climber Alain Robert (1962-)/person who scales the outer walls of a building as a stunt or for building maintenance

sentences.english: The spider web brushed my forehead.
Example: Seeing a spider, even on the TV, always gives me the heebie-jeebies.
sentences.chinese: 即便是在电视上看到蜘蛛，我也会觉得害怕。

sentences.english: He had suggested that we might keep an eye open for any large or colorful spiders .
sentences.chinese: 他建议我们留心色彩艳丽或大的蜘蛛。

sentences.english: The web may be a combined effort of social cobweb spiders.
sentences.chinese: 巨型蜘蛛网可能是由群居的蜘蛛共同织造成。

sentences.english: The web may be a combined effort of social cobweb spiders.
sentences.chinese: 巨型蜘蛛网可能是由群居的蜘蛛共同织造成。

sentences.english: This guy looked like a beaten-up spider-monkey mutant.
sentences.chinese: 这个家伙看起来活像个蓬头垢面的蜘蛛猴变种人。

sentences.english: Spider-Man 3 is due to be released in May 2007.
sentences.chinese: “蜘蛛侠三”预计于2007年五月上市。

sentences.english: Oslash; Starscream, Overlord, Scorponok and Onslaught agree to follow Megatron.
sentences.chinese: 红蜘蛛，霸主，萨克巨人与袭击同谋共保威震天。

sentences.english: Two Spider man were cleaning the glasses of my libary.
sentences.chinese: 孜知书院大扫除，请来了两个蜘蛛侠。

sentences.english: So, when it comes to a film about Spider-Man, I have certain expectations.
sentences.chinese: 因此，每一部有关蜘蛛侠的电影，我都会满心期待。

sentences.english: I thought the Spiderman movie was very good work.
sentences.chinese: 蜘蛛人这部电影做得很棒。

sentences.english: Galvatron destroys him and leads the Decepticons against Earth.
sentences.chinese: 惊破天摧毁红蜘蛛，领霸天虎反扑地球。

sentences.english: Turn up your head, look at the spider on the small corner of the ceiling in your house.
sentences.chinese: 抬起头，看看那只在你家天花板上小小角落的蜘蛛。

sentences.english: Why orb spiders are successful receiver exploiters ?
sentences.chinese: 为何结网性蜘蛛为成功的受讯方剥削者？

sentences.english: He took a breath to clear away the cobwebs of the night as the raven flapped away.
sentences.chinese: 他吸了口气吹走昨夜的蜘蛛网，乌鸦随之扑翅飞开。

sentences.english: He sells tickets like the Spiderman.

definition: lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic
